name: Summoned to the dungeon
description:
Play for hero summoned to the dungeon to fight evil! As soon as hero has defeated the boss they return leaving 1 item from inventory for the next hero. Another hero is summoned in their place with higher level (up to 3 atm xD).

Note: It's recommended to download windows build because html5 version may crush a lot.

Currently featured:

  • 2 Classes with 3 abilities
  • 8 items
  • 2 types of enemies
  • 1 type of boss
  • 1 room type

Controls:

  • W,A,S,D - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Attack
  • Right Mouse Button - 1st ability
  • Q - 2nd ability
  • E - 3rd ability
  • F - Pick up item
  • B - Put item to bag
  • X - Swap item from bag
  • Alt + F4 - Exit

Credits:

Made by Erimav

  • Music: Tamkish
  • Characters & walls tileset: 0x72
  • Ability icons: quintino-pixels
  • Inventory icons:
    • jeevo
    • Arydian
  • Heal animation: pimen
  • SFX: freesound.org
